attributes.action: SUPPORT GLOBAL ORGAN DONOR "DEEMED CONSENT" SCHEME FOR OUT OUT, NOT IN!
attributes.additional_details:
GLOBAL BLOOD & ORGAN DONOR "DEEMED CONSENT" 

The lives that have been saved by opting in has been enormous and those that know thank you with their living souls

'Opt Out' will be the cornerstone of thousands of lives getting a second chance for health. 

Bare this irony mindfully.- know that lives can be saved by doing absolutely nothing but sign this petition to be raised in parliament for action
attributes.background:
Organ Donation Wales is now OPT OUT
After the 1st December 2015 if you have not recorded an organ donation decision (opt in or opt out) on the NHS Organ Donation Register, you will be treated as having no objection to donating any of your organs. This is called "deemed consent".
